title: Update hero section tagline and description text with new content and styling

requirements.summary: Replace hero section tagline with 'Built for Health, Designed for Impact' and style both lines in black color
acceptanceCriteria: The hero section displays 'Built for Health, Designed for Impact' as the tagline
Both lines of the tagline are rendered in black color
The previous tagline 'Nourish Your Body, Empower Communities' is completely replaced

file_operations.description: Update the hero section tagline text from 'Nourish Your Body, Empower Communities' to 'Built for Health, Designed for Impact' and apply black text color styling (text-black) to both lines of the heading. Preserve all other elements including background image, logo, feature pills, and CTA buttons.

requirements.summary: Replace hero section description with new text and style it in bold white color
acceptanceCriteria: The hero section description displays 'Premium Millet Based products crafted with love and care by women, for a healthier you and a sustainable future.'
The description text is rendered in bold white color
The previous description text is completely replaced with the new content

file_operations.description: Update the hero section description text from 'Premium millet-based protein bars and energy products crafted with love by women, for a healthier you and a sustainable future.' to 'Premium Millet Based products crafted with love and care by women, for a healthier you and a sustainable future.' and apply bold white color styling (font-bold text-white). Maintain the component structure without modifying layout, background, or other hero elements.
